## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines (ruff format passes)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added type hints to new functions

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested with real browser automation (if applicable)
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the docstrings for modified functions/classes
- [ ] I have added/updated examples if needed
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if applicable)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added new dependencies, or I have justified why they are necessary
- [ ] I have updated pyproject.toml if dependencies were added
